gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of `RightsGrantedNotYetExercised` at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of `RightsGrantedNotYetExercised` at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, `RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement` SHOULD be equal to + `RightsGrantedDuringFinancialYear` - `RightsGrantedExercisedDuringFinancialYear`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST102Variables1E1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST102Variables1E1_RightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST102Variables1E1_RightsGrantedDuringFinancialYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST102Variables1E1_RightsGrantedDuringFinancialYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST102Variables1E1_RightsGrantedExercisedDuringFinancialYear')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRightsGrantedNotYetExercisedMovement_PrtFST102Variables1E1_RightsGrantedExercisedDuringFinancialYear return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
